levels.description:
Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Releases Drone to attack enemies, and grants self and Drone a <@ba.vup>{attack@prob:0%}</> chance to <$ba.stun>Stun</> enemies for <@ba.vup>{attack@stun:0.0}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>The Drone locks onto an enemy until the enemy is defeated or until the skill is over, then returns to the Operator</>
